verses.verse: And Moses <S%H4872><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to them, Hear, <S%H8085><s%> O Israel, <S%H3478><s%> the statutes <S%H2706><s%> and judgments <S%H4941><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I speak <S%H1696><s%> in your ears <S%H241><s%> this day, <S%H3117><s%> that you may learn <S%H3925><s%> them, and keep, <S%H8104><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> them.
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with us in Horeb. <S%H2722><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> made <S%H3772><s%> not this <S%H2063><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%> with our fathers, <S%H1><s%> but with us, even us, who <S%H428><s%> are all <S%H3605><s%> of us here <S%H6311><s%> alive <S%H2416><s%> this day. <S%H3117><s%>
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> talked <S%H1696><s%> with you face <S%H6440><s%> to face <S%H6440><s%> in the mount <S%H2022><s%> out of the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the fire, <S%H784><s%>

(I stood <S%H5975><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> and you at that time, <S%H6256><s%> to show <S%H5046><s%> you the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> for you were afraid <S%H3372><s%> by reason <S%H6440><s%> of the fire, <S%H784><s%> and went <S%H5927><s%> not up into the mount; <S%H2022><s%>) saying, <S%H559><s%>

I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> which <S%H834><s%> brought <S%H3318><s%> you out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> from the house <S%H1004><s%> of bondage. <S%H5650><s%>
You shall have <S%H1961><s%> none other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> before <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> me.

You shall not make <S%H6213><s%> you any <S%H3605><s%> graven <S%H6459><s%> image, or any <S%H3605><s%> likeness <S%H8544><s%> of any thing that is in heaven <S%H8064><s%> above, <S%H4605><s%> or that is in the earth <S%H776><s%> beneath, <S%H8478><s%> or that is in the waters <S%H4325><s%> beneath <S%H8478><s%> the earth: <S%H776><s%>

You shall not bow <S%H7812><s%> down <S%H7812><s%> yourself to them, nor <S%H3808><s%> serve <S%H5647><s%> them: for I the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> am a jealous <S%H7067><s%> God, <S%H410><s%> visiting <S%H6485><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> on the children <S%H1121><s%> to the third <S%H8029><s%> and fourth <S%H7256><s%> generation of them that hate <S%H8130><s%> me,
And showing <S%H6213><s%> mercy <S%H2617><s%> to thousands <S%H505><s%> of them that love <S%H157><s%> me and keep <S%H8104><s%> my commandments. <S%H4687><s%>

You shall not take <S%H5375><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> in vain: <S%H7723><s%> for the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will not hold him guiltless <S%H5352><s%> that takes <S%H5375><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> in vain. <S%H7723><s%>
Keep <S%H8104><s%> the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> to sanctify <S%H6942><s%> it, as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has commanded <S%H6680><s%> you.
Six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> you shall labor, <S%H5647><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your work: <S%H4399><s%>

But the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> is the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God: <S%H430><s%> in it you shall not do <S%H6213><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> work, <S%H4399><s%> you, nor your son, <S%H1121><s%> nor your daughter, <S%H1323><s%> nor your manservant, <S%H5650><s%> nor your maidservant, <S%H519><s%> nor your ox, <S%H7794><s%> nor your ass, <S%H2543><s%> nor any <S%H3605><s%> of your cattle, <S%H929><s%> nor your stranger <S%H1616><s%> that is within your gates; <S%H8179><s%> that your manservant <S%H5650><s%> and your maidservant <S%H519><s%> may rest <S%H5117><s%> as well as you.

And remember <S%H2142><s%> that you were <S%H1961><s%> a servant <S%H5650><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> brought <S%H3318><s%> you out there <S%H8033><s%> through a mighty <S%H2389><s%> hand <S%H3027><s%> and by a stretched <S%H5186><s%> out arm: <S%H2220><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> you to keep <S%H6213><s%> the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

Honor <S%H3513><s%> your father <S%H1><s%> and your mother, <S%H517><s%> as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has commanded <S%H6680><s%> you; that your days <S%H3117><s%> may be prolonged, <S%H748><s%> and that it may go well <S%H3190><s%> with you, in the land <S%H127><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> gives <S%H5414><s%> you.
You shall not kill. <S%H7523><s%>
Neither <S%H3808><s%> shall you commit <S%H5003><s%> adultery. <S%H5003><s%>
Neither <S%H3808><s%> shall you steal. <S%H1589><s%>
Neither <S%H3808><s%> shall you bear <S%H6030><s%> false <S%H7723><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> against your neighbor. <S%H7453><s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> shall you desire <S%H2530><s%> your neighbor's <S%H7453><s%> wife, <S%H802><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall you covet <S%H183><s%> your neighbor's <S%H7453><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> his field, <S%H7704><s%> or his manservant, <S%H5650><s%> or his maidservant, <S%H519><s%> his ox, <S%H7794><s%> or his ass, <S%H2543><s%> or any <S%H3605><s%> thing that is your neighbor's. <S%H7453><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> your assembly <S%H6951><s%> in the mount <S%H2022><s%> out of the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the fire, <S%H784><s%> of the cloud, <S%H6051><s%> and of the thick darkness, <S%H6205><s%> with a great <S%H1419><s%> voice: <S%H6963><s%> and he added <S%H3254><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> more. <S%H3254><s%> And he wrote <S%H3789><s%> them in two <S%H8147><s%> tables <S%H3871><s%> of stone, <S%H68><s%> and delivered <S%H5414><s%> them to me.

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, when you heard <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> out of the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the darkness, <S%H2822><s%> (for the mountain <S%H2022><s%> did burn <S%H1197><s%> with fire, <S%H784><s%>) that you came <S%H7126><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> to me, even all <S%H3605><s%> the heads <S%H7218><s%> of your tribes, <S%H7626><s%> and your elders; <S%H2205><s%>

And you said, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H2005><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> has showed <S%H7200><s%> us his glory <S%H3519><s%> and his greatness, <S%H1433><s%> and we have heard <S%H8085><s%> his voice <S%H6963><s%> out of the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the fire: <S%H784><s%> we have seen <S%H7200><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> that God <S%H430><s%> does talk <S%H1696><s%> with man, <S%H120><s%> and he lives. <S%H2425><s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore why <S%H4100><s%> should we die? <S%H4191><s%> for this <S%H2063><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> will consume <S%H398><s%> us: if <S%H518><s%> we hear <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> any more, <S%H3254><s%> then we shall die. <S%H4191><s%>

For who <S%H4310><s%> is there of all <S%H3605><s%> flesh, <S%H1320><s%> that has heard <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the living <S%H2416><s%> God <S%H430><s%> speaking <S%H1696><s%> out of the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the fire, <S%H784><s%> as we have, and lived? <S%H2421><s%>

Go <S%H7126><s%> you near, <S%H7126><s%> and hear <S%H8085><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> shall say: <S%H559><s%> and speak <S%H1696><s%> you to us all <S%H3605><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> shall speak <S%H1696><s%> to you; and we will hear <S%H8085><s%> it, and do <S%H6213><s%> it.

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of your words, <S%H1697><s%> when you spoke <S%H1696><s%> to me; and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, I have heard <S%H8085><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the words <S%H1697><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they have spoken <S%H1696><s%> to you: they have well <S%H3190><s%> said all <S%H3605><s%> that they have spoken. <S%H1696><s%>

O that there were such <S%H2088><s%> an heart <S%H3824><s%> in them, that they would fear <S%H3372><s%> me, and keep <S%H8104><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> my commandments <S%H4687><s%> always, <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%> that it might be well <S%H3190><s%> with them, and with their children <S%H1121><s%> for ever! <S%H5769><s%>
Go <S%H3212><s%> say <S%H559><s%> to them, Get <S%H7725><s%> you into your tents <S%H168><s%> again. <S%H7725><s%>

But as for you, stand <S%H5975><s%> you here <S%H6311><s%> by me, and I will speak <S%H1696><s%> to you all <S%H3605><s%> the commandments, <S%H4687><s%> and the statutes, <S%H2706><s%> and the judgments, <S%H4941><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you shall teach <S%H3925><s%> them, that they may do <S%H6213><s%> them in the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I give <S%H5414><s%> them to possess <S%H3423><s%> it.

You shall observe <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> therefore as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has commanded <S%H6680><s%> you: you shall not turn <S%H5493><s%> aside to the right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> or to the left. <S%H8040><s%>

You shall walk <S%H3212><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the ways <S%H1870><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has commanded <S%H6680><s%> you, that you may live, <S%H2421><s%> and that it may be well <S%H2895><s%> with you, and that you may prolong <S%H748><s%> your days <S%H3117><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you shall possess. <S%H3423><s%>
